mapper.select: SELECT A.TODO_CD , A.TODO_NO , A.TIT , A.CON , A.REG_TI , A.END_TI , (SELECT EMP_NM FROM EMPLOYEE B WHERE A.CTOR = B.EMP_CD) as CTOR , A.CTOR as CTOR_CD , A.PROGS , A.TYPE , A.SIT , (SELECT EMP_NM FROM EMPLOYEE B WHERE A.EMP_CD = B.EMP_CD) as EMP_CD FROM TODO A LEFT OUTER JOIN EMPLOYEE B ON (A.EMP_CD = B.EMP_CD) WHERE A.EMP_CD = #{empCd} ORDER BY A.END_TI
SELECT B.EMP_NM , B.EMP_CD FROM TODO A, EMPLOYEE B WHERE A.EMP_CD = B.EMP_CD AND A.TIT = #{tit}
SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD')||TO_CHAR(NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(TODO_NO,7)),0)+1, 'FM000') FROM TODO WHERE TODO_NO LIKE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD')||'%'
